oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2016_male_bee_dataset
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Roswell, Michael
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Plant-Polllinator network
bee
forb
meadow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Each row in this file corresponds to a single bee specimen, and includes the family, genus, species, sex, and sociality for that bee, the time, date, and site of collection, collector and determiner name, and the plant family, genus, and species of the flower from which the bee was caught. Finally there are a few columns with metadata about the collection event (keep, Bombus).
